thread.title: WATCH: Chuck Schumer Lays Out His “Reasons” for Opposing Gorsuch
thread.title_full: WATCH: Chuck Schumer Lays Out His “Reasons” for Opposing Gorsuch

author: Harris
title: WATCH: Chuck Schumer Lays Out His “Reasons” for Opposing Gorsuch
text:
Sabotage of The White House Caused by Obama Administration Loyalists 
Schumer said Democrats in the Senate were prepared to filibuster the Gorsuch’s nomination. If they are able to maintain it, the action would cause a major test for Republicans, who may have to decide whether to exercise the “ nuclear option ” and do away with the filibuster entirely. Now that his party is no longer in power, Schumer thinks that’s a bad idea. 
But what’s worse than the hypocrisy is Schumer’s alleged reasons for opposing the judge. 
“Judge Gorsuch was unable to sufficiently convince me that he’d be an independent check on a president who has shown almost no restraint from executive overreach,” Schumer said. “Second, he was unable to convince me that he would be a mainstream justice who could rule free from the biases of politics and ideology.”   
Never mind the fact that Gorsuch repeated over and over during the confirmation hearings that he is an independent judge with no “political leanings.” The Democrats are just whining about the fact that this is someone who nominated by Trump and Gorsuch is getting the fallout from their bitterness. 
Last March, Obama nominated Judge Merrick Garland to take over the late Justice Antonin Scalia’s place on the bench during his last year in office. 
Republicans of the Senate denied Garland even a confirmation hearing because they saw what Obama was doing as a last ditch power move . 
Now Democrats are aiming for payback… but at what cost? The only people who will pay for this is the American people who will be left wondering when the Supreme Court can get back to business with a full team.
